pr_title: Add hints on Exercise Tutor Dashboard

timeline.message:
change some German formulations
add hint for complaints
add hint for more feedback requests

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        "complaintHint": "Shows all Complaints about assessments except for your own complaints.",
          
          
            
                        "complaintHint": "Shows complaints about assessments of other tutors. Note: complaints about your assessments are not shown here.",
timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -69,7 +69,9 @@
                 "ENGLISH": "English",
                 "GERMAN": "German",
                 "UNKNOWN": "Unknown"
-            }
+            },
+            "complaintHint": "Shows all Complaints about assessments except for your own complaints.",

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        "moreFeedbackRequestHint": "Shows all More Feedback Requests for assessments that you have created."
          
          
            
                        "moreFeedbackRequestHint": "Shows more feedback requests for your assessments."
timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -69,7 +69,9 @@
                 "ENGLISH": "English",
                 "GERMAN": "German",
                 "UNKNOWN": "Unknown"
-            }
+            },
+            "complaintHint": "Shows all Complaints about assessments except for your own complaints.",
+            "moreFeedbackRequestHint": "Shows all More Feedback Requests for assessments that you have created."

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        "moreFeedbackRequestHint": "Zeigt alle Anfragen für weiteres Feedback zu Bewertungen an, die von dir bearbeitet wurden."
          
          
            
                        "moreFeedbackRequestHint": "Zeigt Anfragen für weiteres Feedback von deinen Bewertungen an."
timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -69,7 +69,9 @@
                 "ENGLISH": "Englisch",
                 "GERMAN": "Deutsch",
                 "UNKNOWN": "Unbekannt"
-            }
+            },
+            "complaintHint": "Zeigt alle Beschwerden über Bewertungen mit Ausnahme deiner eigenen Beschwerden.",
+            "moreFeedbackRequestHint": "Zeigt alle Anfragen für weiteres Feedback zu Bewertungen an, die von dir bearbeitet wurden."
